content.query:
WITH rides AS
(
    SELECT TOP 100 * 
    FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://hankyadlsv2.dfs.core.windows.net/partners/Hogia/PARQUET/vehiclejourneysdomain/*/*.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [MyRides]
),
MonitoredVehicleJourneys AS
(
    SELECT TOP 100 * 
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://hankyadlsv2.dfs.core.windows.net/partners/Hogia/PARQUET/monitoredvehiclejourneysdomain/MonitoredVehicleJourneys/part-00000-e8ed2dfb-c5e8-4226-8e23-adea29ef229d-c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
               
)
SELECT
*
FROM rides r
LEFT JOIN MonitoredVehicleJourneys MVJ on r.objectref = MVJ.objectref AND 
            r.operatingdaydate = MVJ.operatingdaydate AND
            r.OrganizationId = MVJ.OrganizationId



--ORDER BY current_day ASC
